h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 1
content: Whenever you stumble upon a blue, glowing enemy and defeat them, you will get a Blood of the Iron Bull. These enemies will also drop their Spirit for you to claim, so be sure to seek them out in our Spirit Locations guide.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 1'.
The content is as follows:
Whenever you stumble upon a blue, glowing enemy and defeat them, you will get a Blood of the Iron Bull. These enemies will also drop their Spirit for you to claim, so be sure to seek them out in our Spirit Locations guide.
